Main

 
Main -> Events -> Multimperia Guardians Current online:



Description: Multimperia Guardians respawn every 2 hours and are divided into two types: PvP and PvE.
Killing Conditions: Damage dealt to bosses is 1 unit; the reward goes to the last one who lands the decisive blow.
Schedule for PvP (GMT +3): 00:30/4:30/8:30/12:30/16:30/20:30
Schedule for PvE (GMT +3): 02:30/6:30/10:30/14:30/18:30/22:30
